posts.message:
I have (5)  beta-coins for Mailbox App, Please reply with your email

Note : first come, first serve :D

If I have a site built with HTML , CSS and JS. What are my options for storing and reading data ? I want to host it on Github Pages so I don't wanna use server side code to avoid the need for a server. Is using JSON the best way ? Are there alternative options ?

i have an idea to make a system / web application framework, it's something like wordpress with the ability to add plugins and very flexible to customize by either developers or admin dashboard, also i want the system to be able to connect the server and get last updates
i want to take it from an idea on a piece of paper to a product release.

any help ?

Amr Eldib Hady Ahmad

Good Evening Geeks, i have an idea and i want to analysis it the best way from the tiny details to object oriented classes and modules and connect all together, i want also allow the system to be able to update from the server, to be clear i want some suggestions about analysis and design methodologies that help me to analysis my system from the idea to the implementation and release :)

So Mean.io
now are 2 projects one dumb which is the original project
and the other is smart from the creator of meanjs.

Mean.io has plugins
Meanjs has plugins

They're not compatible.
Anyone figured out how to use mean.io plugins to meanjs ?

1- BrainStorming   (Deadline 28 of August)

طيب معتقدش إن كان فيه أى اعتراض واضح على الطريقة اللى اقترحتها فى تجميع الأفكار و تنظيمها و إن احنا نبدأ نشتغل عليها

https://www.facebook.com/groups/egyptian.geeks/permalink/803137863059257/

علشان كده أنا شايف إن انا ممكن أبدأ بأول خطوة وهى إن احنا نجمع أفكار و أقتراحات الناس الموجودة فى الجروب بخصوص المشاريع اللى ممكن نشتغل عليها

متهيألى أنسب حاجة إننا نجمع الأفكارفى Spreadsheet 
علشان كده انا عملت فورم على السريع  كده

ممكن تحط أفكارك هنا 
http://bit.ly/1sj8ZbS

تقدر تشوف الأفكار اللى اتحطت من هنا
http://bit.ly/1p4h5S2

أو تقدر تحط افكارك على جيت هب من هنا
https://github.com/egyptian-geeks/Activities/issues

انا شايف إن ٤ ايام مناسب لأى حد إنه يحط أفكارة...لو حد عنده اعتراض على الوقت أو طريقة جمع الأفكار عمتا ممكن يدينا اقترحاتة

Spreadsheet إنشاء الله بعد ما نجمع الأفكار هحط الــ
 هنا فى الجروب و نبدأ نحط طريقة تانية نقيم بيها  الأفكار دى...
